name: Gnome Defence 2
description: Gnome Defense is a fun tower defense game. Build towers, defend your kingdom from the dwarves - do not let them get to the castle! For each kill of the gnome, you will receive coins. For coins you can buy 3 types of buildings: a crossbow-tower, a flamethrower and a gun. As well as a freezing gun, upgrade them and destroy various enemies in order to protect your kingdom. give you in battle!
